title: WaveSpeed AI - AI Deep Dream Generator

hero.heading: Transform Your Imagination into Art
hero.description: Generate stunning visuals from your ideas with our AI-powered Dream Generator. Enter your creative prompt and watch your visions come to life!

prompt.heading: Your Creative Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., A surreal landscape with floating islands, a city in the clouds, a dreamlike forest...

examples.description: Discover the incredible art generated by our AI, turning everyday ideas into breathtaking visuals.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Harness the power of advanced AI technology to ignite your creativity with ease.

items.title: Endless Creativity
items.description: Unlock unique artistic styles and bring your visions to life through intelligent design.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No artistic skills needed! Just provide a prompt and let the AI do the heavy lifting.

items.title: Secure & Private
items.description: Your prompts and generated images remain secure and private, processed locally in your browser.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Create stunning art in just three simple steps

items.title: Enter Your Prompt
items.description: Type in your artistic vision in simple language, describing the scene or concept you want to create.

items.title: AI Generation
items.description: Our advanced technology processes your input and generates visually captivating images that reflect your imagination.

items.title: Download & Share
items.description: Preview your artwork and easily download or share it with friends and followers.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied creators who have turned their ideas into art with our Dream Generator

items.name: Emma Lewis
items.comment: The AI Dream Generator turned my vague ideas into beautiful art! It's like having a personal artist at my fingertips.

items.name: James Parker
items.comment: I love how quickly I can create unique artwork. The results are always impressive!

items.name: Lucy Kim
items.comment: This tool has completely changed my creative process. I can visualize concepts I never thought possible!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our AI Dream Generator

items.title: What can I create with the AI Deep Dream Generator?
items.description: You can create a wide range of artistic images, including landscapes, abstract art, character designs, and more based on your creative prompts. The AI interprets your text and generates unique visuals.

items.title: Is it free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 20 free credits daily, allowing for numerous creations. Additional credits can be earned through challenges and engagement activities.

items.title: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription can utilize generated content for both personal and commercial projects. Free-tier users are limited to personal use.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All image generation happens directly in your browser, ensuring that no data is uploaded or stored on servers, maintaining complete privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Art?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and unleash your creativity. No sign-up required.
